channel.description: Recent content in ipad screen mirror on CINAQ

item.title: Mysterious Ipad screen mirror app detected by PSI Secure browser
item.description: If you’re in a rush for the solution, jump to the bottom of this page. Recently I had my CKS (Certified Kubernetes Security Specialist) exam via the PSI platform. A few weeks earlier when I scheduled the exam I made sure to run the system check because I had troubles with these in the past with my macbook (OSX). I don’t recall which exam platform it was. 10 minutes before the scheduled exam I opened the PSI portal to start the check-in process.
